BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR = "abfss://data-integration@sasynwpdlintnpdeve201.dfs.core.windows.net/"
SOURCE_LAKE_RELATIVE_PATH = "opco/ppod/domain/store/retailer-cpt-user-var/lake/2023-09-11-11-47-28/"
STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH = "opco/ppod/domain/store/retailer-cpt-user-var/stage/"
TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH = "opco/{opco}/domain/store/retailer-cpt-user-var/master/"
KEY_COL="ecom_stor_id"
VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD = 2
VAL_COL_NAME="user_type_cd"
VAL_COL_VLS= "[ 'C','G','M']"
OPCO_LST = ["ppod", "fdln", "hnfd", "stsh", "gntl", "gntc", "mrtn"]
IS_DELTA = False

logger.info("*************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t MDM - STORE - RETAILER - CPT_USER_VAR - Starting with below parameters")
logger.info("*************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t SOURCE_LAKE_RELATIVE_PATH : {0}".format(SOURCE_LAKE_RELATIVE_PATH))
logger.info("\t STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH))
logger.info("\t TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH))
logger.info("\t OPCO_LST : {0}".format(OPCO_LST))
logger.info("\t VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD : {0}".format(VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD))
logger.info("\t VAL_COL_NAME : {0}".format(VAL_COL_NAME))
logger.info("\t VAL_COL_VLS : {0}".format(VAL_COL_VLS))
logger.info("**************************************************************************")

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, DoubleType, StringType,TimestampType, IntegerType, LongType, DecimalType, BooleanType, DateType, ArrayType

STAGE_RTL_USER_VAR_SCHEMA = StructType([
    StructField("ecom_stor_id", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("user_type_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("var_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("acct_cd", StringType(), True),
    StructField("var_qy", DecimalType(38,18), True),
    ])
logger.debug("\t schema-defination : Defined the schema for retailer:cpt_user_var.\n {0}".format(STAGE_RTL_USER_VAR_SCHEMA))

from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp, lit
from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql import functions as f


if(IS_DELTA):
    logger.info("\t RETAILER:CPT_USER_VAR - Delta is not supported.")
else:

    if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH)):
        mssparkutils.fs.rm(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH, recurse = True)
        logger.info("Purging data from STG container {0}".format(STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH))

    df_user_var_lake = spark \
        .read \
        .format("parquet") \
        .schema(STAGE_RTL_USER_VAR_SCHEMA) \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + SOURCE_LAKE_RELATIVE_PATH) \
        .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
        .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
        .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_id", lit('usr-data-integration')) \
        .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_id", lit('usr-data-integration')) 

    str_cols=[colname for colname,coltype in df_user_var_lake.dtypes if coltype=="string"] 
    for colname in str_cols:    
        df_user_var_lake=df_user_var_lake.withColumn(colname, f.trim(f.col(colname)))

    df_user_var_lake = df_user_var_lake \
                                .withColumn("var_qy", df_user_var_lake["var_qy"].cast(DecimalType(precision=10, scale=3)))

                            
        
    df_user_var_lake\
        .sort(KEY_COL) \
        .write \
        .format("delta") \
        .option("inferSchema", "True") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH)

    logger.info("\t stg-load: Created STG data from lake source. \n LAKE = {0} \n STG = {1} \n CNT = {2}".format(SOURCE_LAKE_RELATIVE_PATH, STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH, df_user_var_lake.count()))

from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql.functions import count_distinct, col

def load_master_data(df_stage, path, opco):
    df_stage\
        .sort(KEY_COL) \
        .write \
        .option("mergeSchema", "True") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .format("delta") \
        .save(path)
    logger.info("\t RETAILER:CPT_USER_VAR Master data overwritten.OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_stage.count()))

# main starts here
VAL_COL_VLS_LST=eval(VAL_COL_VLS)
def init(opco):
   
    logger.info("\t Processing  MDM for RETAILER:CPT_USER_VAR. OPCO={0}".format(opco))
    df_user_var_stage= spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RELATIVE_PATH)
    logger.info("\t RETAILER:CPT_USER_VAR loaded from stage. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_user_var_stage.count()))
    if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH.format(opco = opco) )): 
        df_user_var_master= spark \
            .read \
            .format("delta") \
            .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH.format(opco = opco)) 
        logger.info("\t RETAILER:CPT_USER_VAR loaded from master. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_user_var_master.count()))
        is_val_success= validate_count(df_user_var_master,df_user_var_stage,VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD)
        is_values_in_list= check_val_list(df_user_var_stage, VAL_COL_NAME, VAL_COL_VLS_LST)
        
        if (is_val_success & is_values_in_list)== True:
            load_master_data(df_user_var_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH.format(opco = opco), opco )
        else:
            logger.error("\t Failed to override master since threshold is exceding ")
            raise Exception("EXCEEDING_THRESHOLD")        
    else:
        logger.info("\t First Time Master Load")
        load_master_data(df_user_var_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RELATIVE_PATH.format(opco = opco), opco )



def apply_cdc(opco):
    logger.info("\t RETAILER:CPT_USER_VAR - Delta is not supported.OPCO={0}".format(opco))

##############################

# FULL LOAD / DELTA LOAD

##############################
for opco in OPCO_LST:
    logger.info("Processing  MDM for RETAILER:CPT_USER_VAR OPCO={0}, IS_DELTA={1}".format(opco,IS_DELTA))
    if(IS_DELTA):
       apply_cdc(opco)        
    else:
       init(opco)
